00008 ORKatrinFLTEnergyTreeWriter::ORKatrinFLTEnergyTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00009 ORVTreeWriter(new ORKatrinFLTEnergyDecoder, treeName)
00010 {
00011   fEventDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORKatrinFLTEnergyDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);

00020 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORKatrinFLTEnergyTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00021 {
00022   fTree->Branch("eventSec", &fSec, "eventSec/i");
00023   fTree->Branch("eventSubSec", &fSubSec, "eventSubSec/i");
00024   fTree->Branch("resetSec", &fResetSec, "resetSec/i");
00025   fTree->Branch("resetSubSec", &fResetSubSec, "resetSubSec/i");
00026   fTree->Branch("eventID", &fEventID, "eventID/s");
00027   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00028   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00029   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00030   fTree->Branch("energy_adc", &fEnergy, "energy_adc/i");
00031   fTree->Branch("channelMap", &fChannelMap, "channelMap/s");
00032   fTree->Branch("pageNumber", &fPageNumber, "pageNumber/s");
00033   return kSuccess;
00034 }

00036 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORKatrinFLTEnergyTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00037 {
00038   // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00039   // ruin the rest of the run.
00040       // check severity to improve speed:
00041   fSec = fEventDecoder->SecondsOf(record);
00042   fSubSec = fEventDecoder->SubSecondsOf(record);
00043   fResetSec = fEventDecoder->ResetSecondsOf(record);
00044   fResetSubSec = fEventDecoder->ResetSubSecondsOf(record);
00045   fEnergy = fEventDecoder->EnergyOf(record);
00046   fCrate = fEventDecoder->CrateOf(record);
00047   fCard = fEventDecoder->CardOf(record);
00048   fChannel = fEventDecoder->ChannelOf(record);
00049   fChannelMap = fEventDecoder->ChannelMapOf(record);
00050   fPageNumber = fEventDecoder->PageNumberOf(record);
00051   fEventID = fEventDecoder->EventIDOf(record);
00052   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) 
00053   { 
00054     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00055       << "sec-subsec-ID-crate-card-channel-energy_adc = "
00056       << fSec << "-" << fSubSec << "-" << fCrate << "-"
00057       << fEventID << "-"
00058       << fCard << "-" << fChannel << "-" << fEnergy << endl;
00059   }
00060   return kSuccess;
00061 }
